name: The Untitled Tavern: The Shooting Game
name_original: The Untitled Tavern: The Shooting Game
description: Running from a mysterious figure in your past, running from the horrible creatures in the night, and running from the night, itself, you find yourself being hired by a tavern keeper to-well-keep his tavern safe. Will you protect the customers and the tavern keeper, or will you die alongside them...?!
